utility

Class RWFile

  • java.lang.Object
    • utility.RWFile

  • public class RWFile
extends java.lang.Object
    This class allows to write and to read file. This class implements the Serializable class.

                             java.lang.String FileName)

        Parameters:
        list - The array which contains the content that you want to add on your file.
        FileName - The file where you want to write

        public static void writeFloatDataOutputStream(java.lang.Float theFloat,
                                              java.lang.String fileName)
                                       throws java.io.IOException

        Parameters:

        fileName - The name of the file.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - Input output exception.
